control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of its elemental engine, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the airship can't turn.
elemental power, speed 80 ft. If the engine is destroyed, the ship immediately crashes.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the airship can use its helm to move using its elemental engine. It can also fire its ballistas. If it has half its crew or fewer, it can fire only two of the ballistas.

vehicle.name: Aparell d'en Kwalish

speed.note: (or 0 ft. for both if the legs and tail aren't extended)

entries: L'objecte te l'aparença d'un barril hermètic Gran d'unes 500 lliures. Té un ganxo amagat que es pot trobar amb una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) (CD 20). Si es treu obre el cul del barril i permet que 2 criatures (Mitjanes o menors) hi entrin de quatre grapes. L'interior té 10 palanques al fons en posició neutral i que poden moure's munt i avall. Quan s'utilitzen alguns l'aparell es transforma en forma d'un escamarlà gegant.

L'aparell necessita 1 pilot per moure'l com un vehicle. Mentre el cul estigui tancat, l'interior és hermètic contra aire i aigua, i té 10 hores d'aire (parteix-lo pel número de criatures al seu interior).
L'aparell flota a l'aigua. Pot immergir-se fins a 900 peus sota l'aigua. Si s'endinsa més, rep {@damage 2d6} de dany contundent per minut degut a la pressió.

Tota criatura dins l'aparell pot, com acció, moure fins a 2 palanques amunt o avall. Al final de l'efecte, la palanca torna a la posició neutral. Cada palanca, d'esquerra a dreta, té la funció associada a la Taula d'Aparell d'en Kwalish.

entries.caption: Palanques de l'Aparell d'en Kwalish:
rows: Les potes i la Cua s'extenen. Permet caminar i nadar a l'aparell
Les potes i la Cua s'amaguen. La velocitat de l'aparell és 0 i no pot rebre velocitat d'altres efected.
Les persianes de davant es tanquen.
Les persianes dels costat s'obren (2 per banda).
Les persianes dels costat es tanquen (2 per banda).
Surten 2 pinces de davant de l'aparell.
Cada pinça extesa fa aquest atac armat cos a cos: {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent.
Cada pinça extesa fa aquest atac armat cos a cos: {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h} L'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar).
L'aparell camina o nada cap endavant.
L'aparell camina o nada cap endarrere.
L'aparell es gira 90º cap a l'esquerra.
L'aparell es gira 90º cap a la dret.
Unes llums en forma d'ulls irradien llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.
L'aparell s'immergeix fins a 20 peus en un líquid.
L'aparell puja per fins a 20 peus en un líquid.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant.

vehicle.name: Battle Balloon

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of the ship's propeller, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

control.name: Balloon
entries: If its balloon is destroyed, a battle balloon cannot maintain altitude.
80 ft.; 50 ft. while flying into the wind; 100 ft. while flying with the wind

weapon.name: Green Flame Arbalester
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 200/800 peus d'abast (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it) un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant and 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc. If the attack misses, the DM determines where the arbalester bolt hits. Each creature within 10 feet of that spot ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15) to avoid the bolt as it shatters, taking 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc on a failed save.

weapon.name: Harpoon Gun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} (CD 16 per escapar). Until the grapple ends, the target's speed is halved, and it can't move farther away from the battle balloon. Each of the battle balloon's harpoon guns can grapple un objectiu. While it has one or more targets {@condition grappled} with its harpoon gun attack, the battle balloon's speed is not halved.

action: On its turn the battle balloon can take 3 actions if it has twenty or more crew, 2 actions if it has ten or more crew, or 1 action if it has fewer than ten crew, choosing from the options below. It cannot take any actions if it has no remaining crew.

items.name: Fire Ballista.
items.entry: The battle balloon can fire its harpoon guns.

items.name: Fire Green Flame Arbalester.
items.entry: The battle balloon can fire its green flame arbalester.

items.name: Move.
items.entry: The battle balloon can use its helm to move using its propeller. If the battle balloon enters a Large or smaller creature's space, that creature is automatically pushed to the edge of the battle balloon's space. The creature must also succeed on a DC 15 Destresa saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany contundent.

items.name: Harpoon Haul.
items.entry: The battle balloon can pull each target {@condition grappled} by it fins a 30 peus toward the battle balloon.

trait.name: Crushing Wheels
entries: The Demon Grinder can move through the space of any Large or smaller creature. When it does, la criatura ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 11). Si falla, take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition enderrocat}. If the creature was already {@condition enderrocat}, it takes an extra 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany contundent. This trait can't be used against a particular creature more than once each turn.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The Demon Grinder's són màgics.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the Demon Grinder rolls over and falls {@condition enderrocat}, it can't right itself i està {@condition incapacitat} until flipped upright.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
entries: Drive and steer the Demon Grinder.

actionStation.name: Chomper (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) de dany perforant. A target reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ground to bits and spit out through pipes on both sides of the Demon Grinder.Any nonmagical items the target was holding or carrying are destroyed as well.

actionStation.name: Wrecking Ball (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}40 ({@damage 8d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. Double the damage if the target is an object or a structure.

actionStation.name: 2 Harpoon Flingers (Each Station Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Jump
entries: If the Devil's Ride moves at least 30 feet en línia recta, it can clear a distance of fins a 60 peus when jumping over a chasm, ravine, or other gap. Each foot it clears on the jump costs a foot of movement.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the Devil's Ride falls {@condition enderrocat}, it can't right itself i està {@condition incapacitat} until pulled upright.

trait.name: Stunt
entries: On its turn, the driver of the Devil's Ride can expend 10 feet of movement to perform one free vehicle stunt, such as a wheelie or a burnout. Before the stunt can be performed, the Devil's Ride must move at least 10 feet en línia recta. If the driver succeeds on a DC 10 Destresa check using the bike's Destresa, the stunt is successful. Otherwise, the driver is unable to perform the stunt and can't attempt another stunt fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. If the check fails by 5 or more, the Devil's Ride and all creatures riding it immediately fall {@condition enderrocat} as the bike wipes out and comes to a dead stop.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: Drive and steer the Devil's Ride.

reaction.name: Juke
entries: If the Devil's Ride is able to move, the driver can use its reaction to grant the Devil's Ride advantage on a Destresa saving throw.

vehicle.name: Galley

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the galley can't turn.
30 ft. (requires at least 40 crew)
35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant.

weapon.name: Mangonels
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 200/800 peus d'abast (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany contundent.

weapon.name: Naval Ram
entries: The galley has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or an object. Any damage it takes from the crash is applied to the naval ram rather than to the ship. These benefits don't apply if another vessel crashes into the galley.

action: On its turn, the galley can take 3 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 2 actions if it has fewer than forty crew and only 1 action if it has fewer than twenty. It can't take these actions if it has fewer than three crew.

items.name: Fire Ballistas.
items.entry: The galley can fire its {@object ballista||ballistas} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Fire Mangonels.
items.entry: The galley can fire its {@object manganell||manganells} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Move.
items.entry: The galley can use its helm to move with its oars or sails. As part of this move, it can use its naval ram.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the galley can't turn.
sails, speed 35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.
oars, speed 30 ft.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant.

weapon.name: Mangonels
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 200/800 peus d'abast (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany contundent.

weapon.name: Envestir
entries: The galley has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object, and any damage it suffers from the crash is instead applied to the ram. These benefits do not apply if a vehicle crashes into the galley.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the galley can move using its helm. It can also fire its ballistas and its manganells. If it has half its crew or fewer, it moves at half speed and can fire only half of its weapons.

vehicle.name: Keelboat

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the keelboat can't turn.
20 ft.
25 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 35 ft. while sailing with the wind.

weapon.name: Balista
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant.
Keelboats typically include a ballista only when they are equipped for combat.

action: On its turn, the keelboat can take 2 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 1 action if it has only one crew. It can't take these actions if it has no crew.

items.name: Fire Ballista.
items.entry: The keelboat can fire its {@object ballista} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Move.
items.entry: The keelboat can use its helm to move with its oars or sails.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the keelboat can't turn.
sails, speed 25 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 35 ft. while sailing with the wind.
oars, speed 20 ft.

weapon.name: Balista
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant. Keelboats typically include a ballista only when they are equipped for combat.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the keelboat can move using its helm. It can also fire its ballista if it is equipped with one. If it has half its crew or fewer, it moves at half speed and can't use its ballista.

vehicle.name: Longship

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the longship can't turn.
20 ft. (requires at least 20 crew)
45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

action: On its turn, the longship can take the move action below. It can't take this action if it has no crew.

items.name: Move.
items.entry: The longship can use its helm to move with its oars or sails.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the longship can't turn.
sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.
oars, speed 20 ft.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the longship can move using its helm. If the longship loses half or more of its crew, it moves at half speed.

vehicle.name: Mechanical Beholder

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of the ship's magical propulsion unit, with one 90-degree turn. The helm can be attacked only if the hull has taken 100 or more damage. If the helm is destroyed, the mechanical beholder can't move.
burrow 30 ft., fly 30 ft. (flotar), swim 30 ft.

weapon.name: Raig d'Ull Tentacles
entries: {@atk g} The mechanical beholder shoots the following magical eye rays at up to three targets that would be visible to the crew and are within 120 feet of it.

items.name: Disintegration Ray.
items.entry: If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Si falla, take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de força. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust. If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

items.name: Enervation Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action: On its turn the mechanical beholder can take 1 action. It cannot take any actions if it has no crew.

items.name: Rajos d'Ull.
items.entry: The mechanical beholder can use its eye ray tentacles.

items.name: Move.
items.entry: The mechanical beholder can use its helm to move using its magical propulsion unit.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant.

weapon.name: Catapult
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 200/800 peus d'abast (no pot designar objectius que n'estiguin a 60 peus o menys), un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany contundent.

vehicle.name: Rowboat

entries: 15 ft.
Move up to its speed, with one 90-degree turn. Without oars, the rowboat's speed is 0.

action: On its turn, the rowboat can take the move action below. It can't take this action if it has no crew.

items.name: Move.
items.entry: The rowboat can move using its oars.

entries: oars, speed 15 ft. Move up to its speed, with one 90-degree turn. Without oars, the rowboat's speed is 0.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the rowboat can move using its oars.

vehicle.name: Sailing Ship

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of its sails, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.
45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

weapon.name: Balista

action: On its turn, the ship can take 3 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 2 actions if it has fewer than twenty crew and only 1 action if it has fewer than ten. It can't take these actions if it has fewer than three crew.

items.name: Fire Ballista.
items.entry: The ship can fire its {@object ballista} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Fire Mangonel.
items.entry: The ship can fire its {@object manganell} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Move.
items.entry: The ship can use its helm to move with its sails.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of its sails, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.
sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

weapon.name: Balista
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant.

weapon.name: Mangonel
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 200/800 peus d'abast (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany contundent.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the sailing ship can move using its helm. It can also fire its ballista and its manganell. If it has half its crew or fewer, it moves at half speed and can fire either its ballista or its manganell.

trait.name: Crushing Wheels
entries: The Scavenger can move through the space of any Large or smaller creature. When it does, la criatura ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 12). Si falla, take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition enderrocat}. If the creature was already {@condition enderrocat}, it takes an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany contundent. This trait can't be used against a particular creature more than once each turn.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The Scavenger's són màgics.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the Scavenger rolls over and falls {@condition enderrocat}, it can't right itself i està {@condition incapacitat} until flipped upright.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
entries: Drive and steer the Scavenger.

actionStation.name: Grappling Claw (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}L'objectiu està {@condition grappled} (CD 12 per escapar). If the target is a creature, it is {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends.The grappling claw can grapple only un objectiu at a time, and the claw's operator can use a bonus action to make the claw release whatever it's holding.

actionStation.name: 2 Harpoon Flingers (Each Station Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Pilot
entries: The Stahlmaster requires a Medium humanoid to pilot it. While inside the Stahlmaster, the pilot uses the vehicle's speed and action options and can't take reactions or use bonus actions, and the pilot has total cover. If the Stahlmaster es queda a 0 punts de vida, the pilot is ejected from it and lands {@condition enderrocat} en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the vehicle.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Stahlmaster makes two melee attacks, or one melee attack and one ranged attack.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Shoulder-Mounted Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d12}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Crushing Wheels
entries: The Tormentor can move through the space of any Medium or smaller creature. When it does, la criatura ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 13). Si falla, take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.If the creature was already {@condition enderrocat}, it takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany contundent.This trait can't be used against a particular creature more than once each turn.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the Tormentor rolls over and falls {@condition enderrocat}, it can't right itself i està {@condition incapacitat} until flipped upright.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The Tormentor's són màgics.

trait.name: Raking Scythes
entries: When the Tormentor moves within 5 feet of a creature that isn't {@condition enderrocat} or another vehicle per primer cop en un torn, it can rake the creature or vehicle with its protruding blades for 13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) de dany tallant. A creature moves out of the way and takes no damage if it succeeds on a DC 13 Destresa saving throw.A vehicle moves out of the way and takes no damage if its driver succeeds on the saving throw.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
entries: Drive and steer the Tormentor

actionStation.name: Harpoon Flinger (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Juke
entries: If the Tormentor is able to move, the driver can use its reaction to grant the Tormentor advantage on a Destresa saving throw.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the warship can't turn.
20 ft. (requires at least 20 crew)
35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 200/800 peus d'abast (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany contundent.

weapon.name: Naval Ram

action: On its turn, the warship can take 3 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 2 actions if it has fewer than twenty crew and only 1 action if it has fewer than ten. It can't take these actions if it has fewer than three crew.

items.name: Fire Mangonels.

items.name: Move.
items.entry: The warship can use its helm to move with its oars or sails. As part of this move, it can use its naval ram.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the warship can't turn.
sails, speed 35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.
oars, speed 20 ft. with 80 or more rowers, 10 feet with 40 or more rowers, 5 ft. with 20 or more rowers.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant.

weapon.name: Mangonels
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 200/800 peus d'abast (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany contundent.

weapon.name: Envestir
entries: The warship has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object. Any damage it suffers from the crash is instead applied to the ram. These benefits do not apply if another vessel crashes into the warship.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the warship can move using its helm. It can also fire its ballistas and manganells. If it has half its crew or fewer, it moves at half speed and can fire only half of its weapons.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Acidic Bile Sprayer
entries: This hose weapon is attached to demonic organs that produce an acidic bile that dissolves flesh on contact.

entries.name: Acidic Bile Sprayer (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover, {@recharge 5|m})
entries: Acidic bile sprays from a nozzle en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura a dins del con ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 12). Qui falli rep 40 ({@damage 9d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is dissolved, leaving behind any objects it was carrying or wearing.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Arcane Artillery
entries: Using methods similar to those used to produce arma màgicas, a skilled spellcaster imbues a ship's weapon with destructive energy. This weapon gains a +2 bonus to its attack and damage rolls, and its attacks count as magical.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Bones of Endless Toil
entries: The bones of ancient, mysterious creatures festoon the ship. Potent runes crawl across these remains, emitting a sickly green radiance. When a humanoid dies aboard the ship, that creature ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 12). Si supera, it dies as normal. Si falla, it immediately rises as a {@creature zombie} obedient to the ship's captain. The zombie gains a working knowledge of the ship, allowing it to serve as a member of the crew. A number of creatures equal to the ship's creature capacity can be animated in this manner at any given time.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Canian Armor
entries: The infernal iron used to make the vehicle was mined on Cania, the coldest layer of els Nou Inferns. An infernal war machine with Canian armor has an Armor Class of 22 + its Destresa modifier. While the vehicle is not moving, attack rolls made against it have advantage. The infernal war machine also has immunity to cold damage in addition to its other damage immunities, and it's immune to the effects of extreme cold.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Churning Hull
entries: A tempest rages within these rune-etched, iron chains. Raiders and pirates who operate under the blessings of a storm god sometimes make use of this upgrade.
By draping the chains over a ship's hull, the storm's fury thrashes into the water around it. The water within 210 feet of the ship is terreny difícil for everything other than this ship.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Oars de Rellotgeria
entries: Using a combination of magic and clockwork, the oars on this ship require only one crew member to use them, pushing the button or lever that activates them.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Concussive Rounds
entries: Enhanced by abjuration magic, this weapon's attacks burst with raucous noise capable of momentarily distracting and disorienting enemy crews. If this weapon hits a vehicle's hull, that vehicle's speed decreases by {@dice 2d10} feet until the start of the attacker's next turn.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Death Vessel
entries: Crafted with materials harvested from the Erm de l'Ombra, this upgrade grants a ship an aura of dread. Com a acció, the ship can create a pulse of horrific energy. Every creature that is an enemy of the ship who is on board or within 210 feet of it must make DC 14 Saviesa saving throw. Si falla, a creature is {@condition acovardit} of the ship durant 1 minut. Si supera, the creature is immune to this ability for 24 hours. Once this ability is used, it can't be used again until {@dice 1d4} hours have passed.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Defiant Sails
entries: These sails glitter with a fine coat of mitrall treated with abjuration magic. While the sails are unfurled, atacs armats a distància made against the ship and anyone aboard it are made with disadvantage, as a result of the sails' protective magic. This drawback doesn't apply if the attacker is aboard the ship.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Dragon Sails
entries: Dragon scales woven into these sails make them more resistant to damage. The sails gain a +3 bonus to AC, and they have resistance to a damage type based on the type of scales used to craft them, as shown on the Dragon Sails table.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Ever-Full Sails
entries: These billowing sails are woven from cloud-stuff drawn from the Elemental Plane of Air. Wind whips and whistles around them, allowing a ship to move with a speed of 60 feet regardless of direction relative to the wind.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Explosive Rounds
entries: Drawing on powerful evocation magic, this weapon's attacks are imbued with unstable energy that explodes in a fiery blast. When this weapon hits, it deals an extra {@damage 2d6} de dany de foc.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Flamethrower
entries: Although useless against demons, this weapon is great against flammable creatures and objects.

entries.name: Flamethrower (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: Fire shoots out of the weapon's nozzle en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. El foc encèn tot objecte inflamable dins de l'àrea that aren't being carried or worn.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Frost-Locked Hull
entries: This upgrade replaces a ship's hull with supernatural ice drawn from the elemental planes. The hull and the other components of the ship are immune to cold damage but vulnerable to fire damage. The ship can also move at its normal speed over ice of any thickness, floating on the ice at the same depth as it would in water.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Gilded Death Armor
entries: Gold stolen or bartered from the archdevil Mammon plates the vehicle's exterior. This gold can't be removed without destroying the vehicle and turns to dust when the infernal war machine es queda a 0 punts de vida. Gilded death armor grants the infernal war machine resistance to dany contundent, tallant, i perforant.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Grasping Rounds
entries: This weapon creates spectral chains that trail after its shots, restraining enemy vessels in their grasp. When this weapon hits a ship, that vehicle ha de salvar per Força (CD 14). Si falla, it can't move away from the attacker. Com a acció, the attacking ship can end this effect, and the target can end it by taking an action and succeeding on a DC 14 Força check.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Guardian Figurehead
entries: This figurehead depicts an armored knight. Com a acció, the ship can activate this item, causing it to animate as an {@creature iron gòlem}. The gòlem acts on the ship's turn when the captain uses one of the ship's actions. The gòlem remains animated durant 1 minut. At the end of that time, it teleports back to its position as a figurehead. Once a ship uses this action, it can't use it again for 24 hours.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Infernal Screamer
entries: A writhing humanoid torso made of melting wax juts out from this station, with a barbed hand crank between its shoulder blades. The figure telepathically shrieks in agony when the crank is turned.

entries.name: Infernal Screamer (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: The screamer's operator targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of the screamer. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Qui falli rep 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany psíquic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Living Vessel
entries: This vessel's hull was crafted in the Terra Fata under the direction of master eladrin shipwrights. It is a living plant, drawing sustenance from water and sunlight. Vines covered in thick leaves hang over its side, and the wood runs with fresh sap when damaged. The ship gains a +2 bonus to all Constitució checks or saving throws. As long as the ship has at least 1 hit point, it regains 10 hit points every minute.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Necrotic Smoke Screen
entries: The vehicle's driver can activate this magical device com a acció bonus, causing the vehicle to expel a 30-foot cube of opaque smoke directly in front of it or behind it. The cloud is stationary and dura 1 minut. The area within it is heavily obscured. Any creature that enters the cloud per primer cop en un torn o hi començi el torn takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic. A strong wind disperses the cloud. This device needs 24 hours to recharge before it can be used again.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Red Dragon Figurehead
entries: This figurehead depicts a red dragon rearing to strike, its mouth open. Com a acció, the ship can activate this item to create a 60-foot cone of flame that originates from the figurehead. Each creature and object in the cone ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 12). Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Once a ship uses this action, it can't use it again durant 1 minut.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Reinforced Hull
entries: A master shipwright can use superior materials and clever design to make a ship's hull more resilient. Such reinforcement doubles the hull's punts de vida màxims.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Screaming Sails
entries: Woven from the energy of captured wraiths and bound with the spirit of a banshee, these sails groan mournfully when they catch the wind. Com a acció, while within 5 feet of the sails, the ship's captain can cause the sails to unleash a howl. Every creature hostile to the ship who is on board or within 300 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Saviesa saving throw, or the creature rep {@damage 4d6} de dany psíquic and is then {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Once this ability has been used, it can't be used again until {@dice 2d6} hours have passed.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Scything Oars
entries: Sharpened, magically reinforced oars make a vessel dangerous to approach. When the ship takes an action that moves it with these oars, any creature or object in the water within 10 feet of it at any point of the move ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 10). Si falla, rep {@damage 2d6} de dany tallant on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Smuggler's Banner
entries: This flag is meant to be flown from a ship's mast. Its powerful magic causes it to appear as a flag or banner displaying the symbol of a group, captain, or realm friendly to the viewer. Multiple viewers might see different flags or crests.

The banner's true power is its ability to aid a ship in making rapid escapes. Com a acció, the ship and all friendly creatures aboard it teleport up to 3 miles to a known destination of the captain's choice. Hostile creatures aboard the ship don't move with the ship and fall into the water it once occupied. Once this item is used to teleport, it can't teleport in this way again for {@dice 2d6} days.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Soul Spike Armor
entries: The vehicle is covered with spikes inscribed with blasphemous symbols. Luminous, ghostly figures impaled on these spikes wail and reach out in agony.

If a creature that isn't a devil dies within 30 feet of the infernal war machine, its soul (if it has one) is torn from its body and joins the wailing throng impaled on the spikes. As long as its soul remains trapped, a creature can't be raised from the dead by any means. A trapped soul is freed if the vehicle is destroyed, if the spike anchoring it is the target of a {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic, or if the spike is destroyed. Each spike is a Small object with AC 19, 15 hit points, and resistance to all damage except radiant damage.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Storm Giant Figurehead
entries: This figurehead depicts a storm giant clutching a thunderbolt. Com a acció, the ship can activate this item to create a 60-foot cone that originates from the figurehead. Tota criatura a dins del con must make DC 12 Constitució saving throw. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de tro; qui superi, en rep la meitat. A creature that fails its saving throw is also pushed 10 feet away from the figurehead. Once a ship uses this action, it can't use it again durant 1 minut.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Styx Sprayer
entries: This flexible hose is connected to a tank that holds 30 gallons of water from the {@area River Styx|1a3|x}. Each use of the weapon depletes 10 gallons of the water. Refilling the tank requires access to the Styx.

entries.name: Styx Sprayer (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover; 3 Uses)
entries: {@atk rs}: +5 a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}The creature is struck by water from the River Styx and targeted by a {@spell esberlacervells} spell (save DC 20). An already esberlacervellsed creature is immune to this effect, as is a creature adapted to the River Styx. If the target fails its saving throw and the spell's effect on it is not ended within 30 days, the effect becomes permanent, whereupon the creature loses all its memories and becomes a near-mindless shell of its former self. At that point, nothing short of divine intervention can undo the effect.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Taskmaster's Drums
entries: This 4-foot-tall bronze drum comes with a pair of iron mallets. A creature can activate the drums com a acció, causing the hammers to float above the drum and strike it to produce a thundering rhythm. For the next minute, the ship gains one additional action, as long as it has at least one action. Once this item is used, it can't be activated again for {@dice 2d10} hours.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Teleporter
entries: The vehicle's driver can activate this magical device com a acció bonus, causing the vehicle to teleport to an unoccupied space that the driver can see fins a 300 peus away from the vehicle's current position. All creatures and objects in contact with the vehicle are teleported along with it. This device needs 24 hours to recharge before it can be used again.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Vigilant Watch
entries: A row of crystal orbs, each filled with viscous liquid and a beholder's eyeball, is mounted along this ship's hull. {@condition Invisible} creatures are visible while on the ship or within 120 feet of it.
